intro: Senecio tongtchouanensis, commonly known as the Tongtchouan Senecio, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically features narrow, linear leaves and produces small yellow flowers arranged in clusters. It is often found in rocky or arid environments, showcasing its adaptability to harsh conditions. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
